imdb.plot outline: Animated political satire, that manipulated the audio of popular danish TV shows. These animated versions often put uncomfortable political subjects into the formats of feel good television to create a surreal version of reality. The program was censored two times by the Danish National Television and was eventually taken off the air, when it suggested that the danish minister of integration, Inger Støjberg, was a descendant of Hitler, the Pope and a reptilian alien.
imdb.title: Næste års tv
plot: Animated political satire, that manipulated the audio of popular danish TV shows. These animated versions often put uncomfortable political subjects into the formats of feel good television to create a surreal version of reality. The program was censored two times by the Danish National Television and was eventually taken off the air, when it suggested that the danish minister of integration, Inger Støjberg, was a descendant of Hitler, the Pope and a reptilian alien.
